room-stay.promotion-details: Stay For Breakfast Promotion: Rate includes breakfast for up to two adults and children age 12 and under when staying in the same room.

room.title: Suite
room.description:
The Suite welcomes up to 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children (extra charges may apply), and offers a very spacious apartment with a breathtaking view of their quiet Italian courtyard. It also offers a large lounge with a welcoming and cozy atmosphere as well as a luminous bedroom with a soft duvet for extra comfort. The Suite is totally renovated and has a generous space big enough for storage, a desk, a reading area and includes all the modern technology. It is available either in a contemporary style which offers luminous shades, modern furniture, wooden floors and a marble bathroom; or in a an elegant black and white coco style

Between the Dates 17th till the 26th of December the Hotel offer complementary bottle of wine and a free upgrade (subject to availability)

room.title: Double Room with Extra Bed
room.description:
The Superior Room is based on the essentials and will make your stay a success! It is perfect for single or double occupancy but can be made as a triple (extra bed charge might apply). This functional and renovated room is a relaxing place after a long day of work, shopping, or sightseeing. The Superior Rooms are available in a Venetian traditional style which combines warm colors and elegancy of the Italian Renaissance or in a contemporary style which offers luminous shades, modern furniture, wooden floors, and a marble bathroom. Superior Rooms overlook one of their courtyards or the famous Rue Cambon.

The third person sleeps on a rollaway single bed.

room.title: Suite Eiffel Tower - 1 double bed and bedding varies
Duplex Junior Suite & Spa Access
room.description: Peaceful and spacious, the Junior Suites have a surface area of approximately 30m, overlooking the inner hotel gardens, historic or inner courtyards, or the peaceful side street, rue du 29 Juillet. The Junior Suite has a lounge area equipped with a sofa, chairs and coffee table. Bathrooms with bath and shower. Separate toilet. Junior Suite for 1 to 3 people, 1 Queen bed or 2 Twin beds and 1 sofa bed for a third person.

room.title: Family Room & Spa Access
room.description: With a surface area of approximately 45m2, overlooking the gardens, historic or inner courtyards, or the peaceful side street, rue du 29 Juillet. The Family Rooms, including two bathrooms, are known for their comfort and privacy for 4 people. Bathroom with bath, shower and toilet. 2 connecting rooms for 4 people equipped with Queen or Twin beds.
